whatTheyOffer: Since 2005, we have served over 10,000 marginalized youth across the San Francisco Bay area. Trauma-informed yoga and art educators deliver our mindfulness-based programming in short and long-term detention and rehabilitation centers; substance abuse recovery settings; agencies serving CSEC (commercially sexually exploited children); Level 14 facilities (for youth with high psychiatric needs), and schools.
